Any update news?

Hehe, just when I was uploading it to SpacePort

Updated to 2.0, it goes beyond what I initially planned for this mod, so I guess it deserves the major version bump.

  • Inline truncated fairings are now created between two bases (one must be flipped). It won't work properly for off-center bases. If you want it off-center, tell me what for and how it should look.
  • You can now change ejection force by pressing F when mouse is over the side fairing.
  • Fixed rapid unplanned disassembly of side fairings when going out of time warp sometimes.

Future plans:

  • Low-profile fairing base (just a ring) and remaking base model to look more lightweight.
  • Simple procedural decoupler with shroud, intended for engines which have no built-in fairings.
  • Interstage fairing adapter/decoupler with adjustable height and radii which simulates fairing sides supporting the part above by decoupling from it when the side fairings are ejected.
